MOD2 Firmware

Download firmware for your Hagiwo MOD2 Eurorack module

How to Flash Firmware

  1. Hold down the BOOTSEL button on your Raspberry Pi Pico/Pico 2
  2. While holding BOOTSEL, connect the USB cable to your computer
  3. Release BOOTSEL - the Pico will appear as a USB drive
  4. Drag and drop the .uf2 file onto the USB drive
  5. The Pico will automatically reboot with the new firmware

Sample Player Firmware

The Sample Player firmware requires pre-compiled sample data that is not included in the open-source repository.

This firmware features 18 customizable sample slots and supports variable playback speed with high-quality audio.

Support the creator and get this firmware from Hagiwo's Patreon!

Break Beats Firmware

The Break Beats firmware features the legendary "Amen Break" and "Think Break" samples - two of the most iconic drum breaks in music history.

This firmware requires pre-compiled sample data that is not included in the open-source repository.

Support the creator and get this firmware from Hagiwo's Patreon!
